projects.name: buzzTalk
projects.details: A modern real-time chat application built with React and Firebase. It supports one-on-one and group messaging, file sharing, and advanced features like voice and video calls, making it a complete communication solution for teams and individuals.

projects.name: Punjab Appliance Care
projects.details: A sleek and professional business website with a fully customizable landing page, blog system, and multiple side pages. Designed to improve customer engagement and present appliance care services in a user-friendly and mobile-optimized way.

projects.name: Harptec Limited New website
projects.details: A complete redesign and development of Harptec’s corporate website, featuring a responsive landing page, blog system, and customizable content sections. Built with scalability and modern design principles to reflect the company’s professional image.

projects.name: e-commerce store
projects.details: A fully functional e-commerce platform with a secure backend, enabling product management (add/edit/remove), order tracking, and customer account handling. Designed for seamless user experience and efficient store management.

projects.name: movie streaming website
projects.details: An online streaming platform with a large movie library, login/logout functionality, and smooth video playback. Built to provide an engaging and responsive user experience similar to popular streaming services.

projects.name: Realedge Associates OLD Business Company
projects.details: An earlier version of Realedge Associates’ corporate website, crafted from scratch to align with the company’s professional goals. Focused on modern UI/UX design principles and responsive layouts.

projects.name: Quizzical!
projects.details: A fun trivia game powered by a live API, offering random questions across categories. Designed for multiplayer fun and replayability with a clean and interactive UI.

projects.name: Huddle Landing Page
projects.details: A visually appealing static landing page featuring curved sections and modern design elements, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase brand identity effectively.

projects.name: Clipboard Landing Page
projects.details: A minimal yet professional landing page highlighting key features of a clipboard management tool. Designed with clean UI/UX using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Hummer ERP
projects.details: A fully integrated ERP system designed for Hummer Smart Solutions. It includes invoicing, client management, inventory, supplier management, and HR modules. (Private project – live demo and repository unavailable upon client request.)

projects.name: LinkPro
projects.details: A LinkedIn-inspired networking platform built with React and Firebase. Enables professionals to connect, share career achievements, and discover job opportunities with real-time data updates and a smooth interface.

projects.name: Realedge Associates New and dynamic Business Company
projects.details: The new and improved version of Realedge Associates’ website featuring a customizable dashboard, theme management, and dynamic sections. Built for scalability and easy maintenance while showcasing a sleek modern design.

projects.name: blackJack game
projects.details: A browser-based Blackjack game created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features user interaction, game logic, and dynamic score calculation to simulate the casino experience.

projects.name: Harptec Limited Old website
projects.details: The first iteration of Harptec’s company website, designed to present services clearly while adopting modern layouts. Later redesigned for improved user experience and branding.

projects.name: HIC Erp
projects.details: An enterprise-grade ERP system for HIC, covering invoicing, client management, storage, suppliers, and HR. Designed for scalability and operational efficiency. (Private project – no public demo or repository available.)

projects.name: webmax Application
projects.details: A mobile app built for WebMax Advertising Agency to streamline services such as digital ads, video editing, and client communication. Designed for performance and ease of use on Android devices.

projects.name: In One Application
projects.details: An educational communication platform that connects teachers and students in one place. It supports real-time interactions and collaborative features to enhance the learning experience. One of the first of its kind in Egypt.

testimonials.name: Ajay
testimonials.description: Working with Marco was a game-changer. he created a modern, user-friendly website that perfectly represents our brand. The process was effortless, and the results have significantly boosted our business.

testimonials.name: Tejinderpal
testimonials.description: Marco Khairy is one of the very few freelancers on upwork those deserve 5 star ratings for their dedication, hard-work as well as 'i will do it' attitude. Any one looking for professional website building with advance approach like react js. Marco is the right person. Thanks Mr Marco for your incredible work !

testimonials.name: omar mohamed
testimonials.description: شركة محترمة و اتشرفت بمعرفتهم  و شكرا علي تعبكم و شغلكم الممتاز في انجاز المشروع التخرج في وقت قصير جدا

testimonials.name: emam khaled
testimonials.description: التعامل مع ماركو كان في قمة الاحترافية. قدر يفهم متطلباتنا بسرعة وينفذ نظام ERP متكامل ساعدنا نرتب شغلنا ونوفر وقت ومجهود كبير. فعلاً تجربة مميزة.

testimonials.name: muhammad abdel aziz
testimonials.description: ماركو ساعدنا في تطوير تطبيق موبايل بجودة عالية وتجربة استخدام سلسة جداً. التسليم كان في الميعاد والنتيجة فاقت توقعاتنا. شكراً ليه على شغله الممتاز.

testimonials.name: mahmoud fady
testimonials.description: بجد شغل احترافي ودعم مستمر. النظام اللي اتعمل ساعدنا نتابع كل تفاصيل الشغل بدقة وسهولة. ماركو عنده التزام ومرونة في تنفيذ أي تعديل نحتاجه.
